title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe a strategy that this interest group can use to address the issue in the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the resources available to the NEA could impact the effectiveness of the strategy in part A.

For Task C, the response must explain how a block grant for education could affect the issue in the scenario in some states but not in others.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
